thoughts.text: The grass is too tall...
I don't want to look at the kitchen.
Quit leaving your dishes around like a slob!
I can't see the sink...
I don't want to play games...
I don't want to shower in that...
I don't have enough energy to change the sheets...
Forgot about groceries...
You don't deserve food.
That room is nothing but boxes...
You forgot again, idiot.
It's hot in here...
You're worthless.
Do I know what I want to do for a living?
Why would anyone hire you?
I don't know if I'll get hired...
Stil no interviews...
Can I even get a part-time job?
Mom's probably busy...
Eveyone's too busy for you.
Do I have any friends left?
Does anyone actually want to talk to me?
This degree has done nothing for me...
You suck.
